name: Flower Defense (Zibon Badi, R4BN, Henzu)
description:
A tower defense game inspired by Vampire Survivors! Place fences, pick your flamethrower and burn every bug that comes your way!

This project has been created as part of an educational game jam. The full source code of the game is available at https://github.com/zibonbadi/flowerdefense/ .

Credits:
  • Zibon Badi: Audio, engine, additional gameplay programming & additional spritework
  • R4BN: Gameplay programming
  • Henzu: UI programming, Spritework & game design
External assets
  • Background music: JAM - Lift Your Soul
  • In-game font based on Boxy Bold by Cliff Belanger
  • libopenmpt
